Greetings. It is I, Dave. Pleasure to meet you. Oh, I am sorry, were you expecting a save point here? My apologies. My appearance is very similiar to a save point, but I am actually just Dave. I have no special properties, nor can you use me to save your game like at a save point. Alas all I can do is sit here and talk. I wish I had legs so I could jump around like you, that would be fun.
